backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user, candidate, employer, job, application, chat, rating, and notification types with login, access control, and initial profile setup logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI requirements related to social icon cleanup and associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React application by mounting the root element and importing main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, routing, portals, global layout, and profile setup logic with TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Candid: Candidate profile viewer/editor supporting updates, CV upload, and listing application statuses.
frontend/src/components/candidate/ChatTa: Messaging interface that lists conversations, displays messages, and allows sending new messages to selected users.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Employ: Placeholder employer directory card indicating the feature is coming soon.
frontend/src/components/candidate/JobSea: Job search interface with filtering, job listing display, and application flow using stored candidate CV.
frontend/src/components/employer/Candida: Employer tool to search candidates by department and location and display matching candidate profiles.
frontend/src/components/employer/Employe: Implements employer messaging UI that loads conversations, displays partner lists, shows messages, and allows sending new messages.
Displays and edits employer profile data using form fields, with loading, editing state, and update submission.
frontend/src/components/employer/JobMana: Provides job CRUD UI for employers, including create/edit dialogs, department selection, and application viewing logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with branding, quick links, contact info, and the sole social media section using SOCIAL_LINKS.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component handling navigation, smooth scrolling, mobile menu, authenticated user menu, and branding.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial profile creation, handling candidate and employer fields, CV upload, and registration via API hooks.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp contact button that becomes visible after a delay and opens a predefined chat link.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Exports static contact information including phone, WhatsApp, email, and location.
frontend/src/constants/socialLinks.ts: Defines an array of social media link configs with URLs, icons, labels, and behavior types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, logout, identity state, and initializes AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for login, user, candidate, and employer profile operations using an ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles with light/dark theme variables and custom WhatsApp floating button animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPortal.tsx: Admin dashboard with authentication checks, analytics, user/job management, and delete/export actions.
frontend/src/pages/CandidatePortal.tsx: Candidate portal with tabbed navigation for jobs, employers, chat, and profile sections.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerPortal.tsx: Employer portal with tabbed navigation for job management, candidate search, chat, and profile.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page showing service categories and login/start actions for different user types.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: React page rendering the Privacy Policy with sections describing data collection, usage, and security.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Empty or placeholder Services page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: React page displaying Terms of Service with sections covering user accounts, acceptable use, and platform rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, containers, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, features, and new feature requests for social icon behavior and UI cleanup.
